chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: There are a lot of special cases in Czech typography. One of these rules is based on using an unbreakable space after a monosyllable preposition. In TeX, we can use the program vlna to manage text automatically. This plug-in aims enable the same with Scribus text frames.
